arabic: إِنَّمَا الأَعْمَالُ بِالنِّيَّاتِ وَإِنَّمَا لِكُلِّ امْرِىءٍ مَا نَوَى...
english: Actions are judged by intentions, and everyone will get what they intended.
Islam is built on five pillars: testimony of faith, prayer, zakah, fasting, and pilgrimage.
The lawful is clear and the unlawful is clear, and between them are doubtful matters.

arabic: إِنَّ أَحَدَكُمْ يُجْمَعُ خَلْقُهُ فِي بَطْنِ أُمِّهِ...
english: The creation of each one of you is brought together in his mother's womb for forty days...
Whoever innovates into this matter of ours that which is not from it, it is rejected.
That which is lawful is clear and that which is unlawful is clear...
Religion is sincere advice.
I have been commanded to fight the people until they testify that there is no god but Allah...
What I have forbidden you, avoid. What I have ordered you, do as much of it as you can.
Allah is pure and accepts only that which is pure...

arabic: تَرَكْتُ فِيكُمْ مَا إِنْ تَمَسَّكْتُمْ بِهِ...
english: I have left among you that which if you hold fast to it, you will never go astray: the Book of Allah.
Part of the perfection of one’s Islam is leaving that which does not concern him.
None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
Allah has prescribed obligations, so do not neglect them...

arabic: لاَ يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يَكُونَ هَوَاهُ...
english: None of you truly believes until his desires are in accordance with what I have brought.
Actions are only judged by how they end.
Fear Allah wherever you are, and follow up a bad deed with a good deed...
Young man, I will teach you some words: Be mindful of Allah and He will protect you...
Be mindful of Allah, and Allah will be mindful of you...

arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَتَبَ الإِحْسَانَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ...
english: Allah has prescribed excellence in all things...
Say, ‘I believe in Allah,’ and then remain steadfast.
If I pray the obligatory prayers, fast in Ramadan, and make lawful what is lawful and unlawful what is unlawful, will I enter Paradise? The Prophet said: Yes.
Purity is half of faith.

arabic: مَنْ سَلَكَ طَرِيقًا يَلْتَمِسُ فِيهِ عِلْمًا...
english: Whoever follows a path in search of knowledge, Allah will make easy for him a path to Paradise.

arabic: كُلُّ سُلاَمَى مِنَ النَّاسِ عَلَيْهِ صَدَقَةٌ...
english: Every joint of a person must perform charity each day the sun rises.
Charity extinguishes sin as water extinguishes fire.
Fear Allah wherever you are...
The world belongs to four types of people...
Allah has overlooked for my Ummah their mistakes, forgetfulness, and what they are forced to do.
There should be neither harming nor reciprocating harm.

arabic: مَنْ دَلَّ عَلَى خَيْرٍ فَلَهُ مِثْلُ أَجْرِ فَاعِلِهِ...
english: Whoever guides someone to goodness will have a reward like the one who did it.
Do not become angry.
A Muslim is the brother of a Muslim. He does not wrong him, nor abandon him, nor despise him.
Whoever loves for Allah, hates for Allah, gives for Allah, and withholds for Allah, has completed faith.

arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يَكُونَ اللَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ...
english: None of you truly believes until Allah and His Messenger are more beloved to him than anything else.

arabic: مَنْ سَرَّهُ أَنْ يَبْسُطَ لَهُ فِي رِزْقِهِ...
english: Whoever would like his provision to be increased and his life span extended, let him maintain ties of kinship.

arabic: إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَتَبَ الْكِتَابَ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَخْلُقَ...
english: Allah wrote the decree of creation fifty thousand years before He created the heavens and the earth.
Indeed Allah has a sense of protective jealousy, and a believer also has it.
Allah has pardoned for my nation what they think to themselves, so long as they do not act upon it or speak of it.
Be in this world as though you were a stranger or a traveler.

arabic: لاَ يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يَتَّبِعَ هَوَاهُ...
english: None of you truly believes until his desires are subservient to what I have brought.
Allah stretches out His hand at night to accept the repentance of those who sinned during the day...
